group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approval was obtained from the Columbia University Irving Medical Center Institutional Review Board (CUIMC IRB AAAS0395). Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
